extendedInfo.description: A highly optimized and feature enhanced port of the latest SVN Version of the DOSBox DOS emulator for Android where new optimizations and features are introduced at a rapid pace. Run your old DOS games quickly, with full mouse, keyboard, sound and analog joystick emulation. If you have no experience with DOS emulators, please read our FAQ first ( http://goo.gl/0HaF5 )NOTE: As with any DOS emulator, this application needs access to the SDCARD and plenty of free memory to run.  Your phone should have at least 50+MB to run DosBox properly.  Copy your old DOS games onto your SD card and start playing!FEATURES:â FASTEST DOS Emulator for Androidâ NEW! Support for playing many Windows games!â NEW! MIDI Sound Emulationâ NEW! IPX Networking Supportâ NEW! Sliding "QuickMenu"â NEW! Transparent Hide-able ActionBarâ NEW! Mappable Virtual On-Screen Buttonsâ NEW! Now includes separate optimized builds for ARM and MIPS based Android devices.â NEW! Based upon latest DOSBOX SVNâ NEW! Universal Button/Controller Support (Wii, Xbox360, Game Gripper, PS3, Xperia Play controllers and more!).â Game Profiles Managerâ Absolute Finger & Pointer tracking, use DOS applications intuitively on a touch screen! (experimental)â Gestures Supportâ Customize Dos Game Covers/Icons in Profile Managerâ Button Mapping Supportâ ARMv7 & NEON processor optimization for enhanced speedâ Support for Phones & Tabletsâ Use DPAD and Optical Trackpad as mouse/joystick.â Highly optimized port of the lastest DosBox version.  Additional enhancements for modern ARMv7 phones.â Virtual Mouse emulation mode, with left & right click!â Can remap volume keys to mouse or joystick buttons.â Virtual Multi-Touch *Analog* Joystick emulation!â Full Sound Support!â Full Android Input Method support (use any keyboard from the market - HackersKeyboard recommended!)â FAST!! ( http://goo.gl/Tt7X5 )â Special Key Combination emulation.â Switch to portrait or landscape mode without restart!â Stretch scaling to full landscape.â Default Fast & HQ Scaling modes.â Supports external USB/Bluetooth mice & joysticks [Android 3.1+]â Supports Right Click on Trackpads & mice. [Android 4.0+]â Full ASUS Transformer keyboard & trackpad support.â Can be used with any 3rd Party Keyboard replacement to emulate DPAD or Cursor Keys (our GamePad, or HackersKeyboard is recommended).â Full Ice Cream Sandwich (ICS) and Jelly Bean (JB) support (Android 4.0, 4.1, 4.2).To Enable Cursor/Arrow Keys:============================Use any 3rd party Android Input Method (Keyboard) replacement.  Highly recommend the free HackersKeyboard, which supports transparency, cursor keys and Function Keys or you can try the Free 'GamePad' keyboard. With DosBox Turbo, there is no need to pay extra for virtual cursor keys and/or gamepads.FAQ:===Q. Where is the settings button?? (or How can I access the settings menu)?A. You have three easy ways of accessing the DosBox Turbo Settings Menu.1. From Landscape Mode: from close to the top margin, swipe down to show the ActionBar. From the action bar, you can access the settings menu as well as many other options.2. From Portrait Mode: The actionbar will always be visible, and you can just access the settings menu by clicking the (3 dots) at the top.3. From either Portrait or Landscape: Place your finger near the left margin and swipe right, you'll have access to the DosBox QuickMenu.Q. Can it run Fallout?A. Yes, check out this video: http://youtu.be/85XV8FP70JIQ. Can it run Daggerfall?A. Yes, check out this video: http://youtu.be/CBi0joFymSYQ. Can it run Windows and play Windows Games?A. Yes, if you have a fast/modern device. Please see the FAQ & watch this video: http://youtu.be/f21K1Exq2jAQ. How do I install the Profile Manager?Click "Install Profile Manager" in the settings menu.Q. How do I use the new Profile Manager?** Note, please update to the latest 2.0.0 DosBox Manager.http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dJ_zMAO64Js

reviews.title: Frankly a Great Program
reviews.comment: Much improved performance on Krait since the last update. Very good job.  Still a bit slower than what it should in theory be (compared to say tegra 3) but its perfectly acceptable already.
reviews.author: Alexey Mitronin

reviews.title: Near prime product, needs some improvment
reviews.comment: Some features mastered in other ports (auto-scaling relative to original size, like with aDosBox for clear fullscreen mode) could use incorporation into this build. However the mouse tracking and other features easily offset these limitations making it a thoroughly useable, playable app. Thanks! Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Jeff Odgis

reviews.title: Losing my marbles
reviews.comment: Yes! Do the Windows install and Maxis\' Marble Drop runs perfectly in full screen mode! Perfect game for a mobile device!  Amazing!
reviews.author: Rick Ketterman

reviews.title: Great Emulation
reviews.comment: I run Dosbox Turbo on my HTC One and side loaded on my Ouya. both run fantastic, and I have enjoyed breaking out some of my old dos games. I would love to see this in the Ouya Store with setting specific to the Ouya (built in controller mapping, pre configured to be optimized since you only have 1 target)
reviews.author: Aaron Lesch

reviews.title: Super Fast
reviews.comment: Still cannot remap \"delete\" key for Executioners game. ***  My old TF101 overclocked to 1.5 ghz with a custom rom runs everything made for a 486 back in the the day. Speed is excellent, lots of options to fool around with. This is by far the best DOS emulator on android. ***
reviews.author: Rob MATHESON

reviews.title: Cant update
reviews.comment: Package file was not signed correctly when updating.
reviews.author: Anthony Stump

reviews.title: Best DOS emulator on the market
reviews.comment: Give FishStix your money people, He deserves it! I have only had this 2 days and have a hefty collection all organized and ready to boot using the dosbox manager. I have to thank this guy personally after trying other dos booters and dealing with random crashes and other performance issues this has been a dream. Its easy to use IF you have any dos experience and if you dont then learn it here cause you will definitely be rewarded. Thank you!
reviews.author: Justin Smith

reviews.title: Woks great. Doesn\'t remap shield controls
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this on a droid 3 with no problems. I just installed it on my shield and I can\'t remap any of its buttons. I guess it\'s the proprietary api nvidia uses for the shield controller? Other than that it works flawlessly. I don\'t want to root my device just for that.
reviews.author: Chris Mayo

reviews.title: Never opens
reviews.comment: On my Sony R800x it has never opened, it force closes every time. Looked promising though.
reviews.author: tanner wendland

reviews.title: Very Good
reviews.comment: Excellent implementation of DOSBox for Android.  Very much worth the cost.
reviews.author: Glenn Thacker

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Very versatile. Been playing quite a lot of Civilization 1 on my Tab 7.7 thanks to this app :)
reviews.author: Are Espelid Wold

reviews.title: Total perfection.
reviews.comment: Absolutely brilliant!  Anyone over the age of thirty should have this.  Thank you so much.  :o)
reviews.author: James Eggertsen

reviews.title: Can i play win95 games via disbox?
reviews.comment: To all purchasers and to the creator:  Can you please send a tutorial on how to play starcraft or any win95 games who are in image format via dosbox? If its possible....thanks. i am willing to donate via paypal. My email is patrickdzn@gmail.com
reviews.author: lawsterlawster

reviews.title: Amazing. Simply amazing.
reviews.comment: This is pure and simple, an amazing emulator. I am now able to play all  my favorite dos games, and even my favorite early windows games, such as Age of empires, and Seven kingdoms 2. Now I\'m working on getting Age of empires 2 working. 5 stars, keep the updates coming. :) edit: for some reason my Bluetooth mouse isn\'t working right in windows 98... unsure the reason
reviews.author: Tristan Jones

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Alright, this is easily the best thing ever to grace Play Store. Runs flawlessly with my keyboard dock. Hello Might and Magic: World of Xeen!
reviews.author: Robert Kuropatkin

reviews.title: Best and fastest for my system!
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried a couple, but found this one to be the best.  Much faster than the free port.  Changed to 4 stars from 5 for lack of customizable, virtual, placeable buttons - may work great for phones with HW keys, but not tablets.  Suggest developer look at the way some SDL ports handle on-screen customizable buttons, like pelya\'s SDL port.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty darn good
reviews.comment: Great app. Warlords II, Elite, XCOM, Duke Nukem, etc. on the go. Brilliant!
reviews.author: Zane Ball

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Exellent dos emulation. The turbo is well worth the money. Get the free manager too, its very helpful.
reviews.author: Airhead Xargon

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: So incredible and new update seems even faster :)
reviews.author: Scott Cartwright

reviews.title: The best DOS emulator
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this app on my Asus Transformer TF300, and it\'s amazing with eitherr a Bluetooth keyboard or my tablet\'s keyboard dock. I\'ve got Windows 3.11 working with 1024x768 resolution and sound. It even works on my rooted Nook Simple Touch. SimCity 2000 and Oregon Trail Deluxe work great.
reviews.author: Corbin Davenport
